resources.string: A long time ago in academy far, far away...

A young ninja developer was developing an android application with which he wanted to bring balance in the force. The Dark Side of the force wanted to stop him but they were too weak for him... he was the chosen one! The application has a variety of star wars heroes separated into two views: Dark Side and The Force heroes. The app also has about application info, and the possibility to create your own personal hero. The user can also make contact with Master Yoda and ask him a question or ask him for advise. If the user thinks he/she is real Star Wars fan he/she can test his/her knowledge about Star Wars. And finally for the kids there is a custom made lightsaber which can be turned on and off and it color can be change...
